TopicTitle: Keeping/discarding all science reports (or how to close science report window fast)

Articles.Content:
I finally decided to ask a question that was annoying me since ~0.18:

If I have multiple science reports in 1 part, then I click "review" in right-click menu and then I must do something about each of them (i.e. keep/discard/transmit). Say, I found and transmitted the only report I wanted, how to quickly close that window without clicking "keep" for each report (vessel switching/EVA doesn't count)?
Switch to another vessel... it's what I do.

5 hours ago, Plusck said:

Switch to another vessel... it's what I do.

EVA the kerbal on-board is a quick way to do a switch...when the Mun lander is the only craft nearby

Yep, switching was the only way I found to do it. Seems like there is no other option (quite strange, though, stored science really ask for some more convenient browser/manager, especially for miltiplanet trips).
There is a feature request in the queue for a "Keep All" button when you are scrolling a big list of experiments. It didn't make it into the current version, but it should be along someday.

15 hours ago, bewing said:

There is a feature request in the queue for a "Keep All" button when you are scrolling a big list of experiments. It didn't make it into the current version, but it should be along someday.

Even that would only be a partial solution. We need a list of experiments, but it only shows the currently on-ship collected experiments...come to think of it, it would also be great to see the actual R&D list in-flight.
